meanings.definition: A group of people born within the same 20-year period.
meanings.sent1: The bimillennials in our class all celebrate their birthdays together.
meanings.sent2: Many bimillennials enjoy using technology in their daily lives.
meanings.sent3: The bimillennials at the party had a contest to see who could blow the biggest bubblegum bubble.
meanings.sent4: The bimillennials of today have access to information at their fingertips like never before.
meanings.sent5: The bimillennials' love for social media is a defining characteristic of their generation.

meanings.sent1: The historian studied the bimillennials of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The concept of bimillennials helps us understand the vastness of history.
meanings.sent3: In the game, players had to travel through bimillennials to reach the final level.
meanings.sent4: The bimillennials marked significant changes in human civilization.
meanings.sent5: The bimillennials between the fall of one empire and the rise of another were tumultuous.
